```{r, init}
library(tidyquant)
library(tidyverse)
library(RTL)
```

```{r, data_import}
tickers <- c("RB=F", )
rbob <- tq_get("RB=F", get = "stock.prices", from = '2021-01-01')
EIA_Data <- eia2tidy(ticker = "PET.MCRFPTX2.M", key = "UKCNbCB0m8aixfPBshQU3Jdlz2uZsEbG2HebvhHX", name = "TexasProd")
```

```{r, eda}
ggplot(rbob) +
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y = close)) +
  labs(title = "RBOB", x = "Date", y = "Closing Price")
```
